description: Search a growing library of professionally summarized books. Read comprehensive summaries, chapter-by-chapter breakdowns, tables of contents, and distilled key insights. Find titles by author, title, or ISBN and fetch specific chapter summaries when you need them.

apiUrl.description: Optional base URL for the LibraLM API service

capabilities.name: get_book_summary

capabilities.name: get_book_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific book

capabilities.name: get_table_of_contents
capabilities.description: Get the table of contents for a book with chapter descriptions

capabilities.name: get_chapter_summary
capabilities.description: Get the summary for a specific chapter of a book
